company_name: E. BERGER STRASSEN- UND PFLASTERBAU GMBH
supplier_of: nurseries | indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry | textile plants | marble and natural stones | structural work
information: The company E. BERGER STRASSEN- UND PFLASTERBAU GMBH, is a Service Provider, founded in 1860, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Nurseries, Textile plants, Marble and natural stones, and Structural work industries. It is based in München, Germany.
keywords: Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry, Nurseries, Textile plants, Marble and natural stones, Structural work
